column5: Sorry to hear of the bad news Rick. May peace be with him and all the best to your Grandmother.
Sorry to here that Rick. My condolences to you and your family.
Our condolences to you and your family, Rick.
My condolences, Rick   Tracker (Don)
This is terrible news Rick. I feel sorry for you and your family. A prayer has been sent your way.
My sincere condolences and wish you and your family the best.  Bob
Very sorry to hear about this Rick. If you would like to get out fishing with me for a little relaxing therapy, you are welcome any time. You know how to get a hold of me.  All the best,  Aaron
Sorry to hear the news Rick, my condelences.
I'm sorry Rick.  You surely have a heavy load these days.  You're never alone on OFC.
My condolences Rick.   TDunn

I feel for you Rick.  It can be tough to cope with a loss such as your.  No parent should have to see there children pass, no matter the age. Give your Grandmother a giant OFC group hug.  Stay strong.

Rick our thoughts and prayers are with you. Very shortly it will be the anniversary date of the passing of our daughter. May God give you and your family strength, peace, calmness and the determination to carry on your family legacy. My 15 year old son will say a special prayer for you tonight before dinner. If you every feel the need to express yourself feel free to contact us. God Bless. Mr. Blizzard
Rick my prayers and thoughts are with you and your family and I also hope that your Grandmother is resting comfortably.. Hope it all gets better soon.
My deepest condolances to you and your family Rick.
my deepest sympathies Rick, take care!
My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family Rick
Hang in there bud, Thats a tough pill to swallow... You have my sincere condolences
So sorry to hear of your loss Rick...
Really sorry to hear about that Rick, that is a lot to undertake.  My condolences.
my condolences to the family
my condolences Rick
Sorry to hear Rick.
Another terribly sad moment in life, sorry for your loss.
My condolences Rick.
My condolences, as well, Rick.
Very sorry to here of your loss Rick our thoughts are sent your way I also hope that your grandmother has some peace in her last days.  Mike
Ah geez, my condolences Rick.
My deepest condolences Rick.
Sorry to hear that Rick. My Dad's been gone 10 yrs now and I carry his spirit everywhere. It comforts me and I hope it will you too
Haven’t been online much Rick.  This definitely isn’t what I was expecting to read on the board.  Very sorry to hear about all of this.  My deepest condolences.
Very sorry to read this Rick. You have my condolences and I hope things go as well as possible for your Grandmother. Take care.
My sincere condolences Rick.
My condolences as well, Rick.
So sorry to read this Rick. My condolances to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss Rick. My condolences to you and your family.
May the good Lord be with you during this difficult time and you find strength in those near you.  condolences
Very sorry to hear of this Rick!!!! You and your family has my deepest condolences.
Prayers from our family to yours Rick.
My condolences to you and your family, Rick.
Condolences Rick. It must be a tough time, stay strong.
Rick you have my condolences, I'm really sorry to hear the tough times your family is going through
My condolences. May God bless his soul.
My condolences to you and your family Rick. Sorry for your loss.

As some of you know, my father passed away Friday. This was weeks after his mother (my grandmother) was told to get her affairs in order since her liver cancer was beyond hope. I can only hope her remaining time is comfortable but this has really been trying on her will to survive. So it is a little quiet around my place and I am dealing with the powers that be in getting everything straightened out. As per my father's request there will be a short visitation with no service this week. Thanks to all who have been so supportive.
My condolences, Rick.
Sorry to hear it Rick. Our condolenses go out to you and your family. just take it one day at a time and you will pull threw this hard time.
Really sad news Rick and sorry to hear it.  Condolances from from my home to yours.
My condolences Rick.  A
my condolances Rick. A sad day indeed.  Paul
My condolences
Please accept my sincerest condolences.
Oh man Rick.  So sorry bud. Your in my thoughts, chin up.  I know the pain.
Sorry to hear of this Rick.  I'm sure it's a difficult time.  You have our condolences.
My condolences Rick
Very sorry to hear, condolences to you and yours.
Sorry to hear of this news
Very sorry to hear this news Rick.  My thoughts are with you and your family during this time...
I remember meeting him, Rick, a talented musician among other qualities.  I am so sorry.

Well Rick.. remember it's a two way door. It's my turn to say if you need ANYTHING you let me know.  There will be some LONG days ahead, but also some good memories to make you smile.... just when you think you can't go any further with that day.  Wayne
My condolences, Rick
Very sorry to hear of the sad news Rick.  Please accept my sincerest condolences.
Sorry to hear it Rick...sent a PM wayyy upstairs for you and the family.
my condolences, Rick.
Rick, sorry to hear about your loss. Hang in there.
Rick, condolences from my family to yours.

I am sorry to hear this Rick. It is one of the hardest things in the world to have to bury a family member. I hope that you and your Mom can pull thru this with as little pain as possible. Just know that you all are not alone and people are standing in line to help you thru this time of grief. While I never knew your parents the son that they raised shines as an example of how great they are and the reason that they were put on this earth.  In sorrow  Art and Joe
sorry to hear Rick
Deepest condolences
